org.marc4j
Class MarcXmlParserThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.marc4j.MarcXmlParserThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class MarcXmlParserThread
extends Thread

Extends Thread to produce Record objects from MARCXML data.

Author:
Bas Peters
